title: The September issue of Galley Gab published
content:
You can download the free PDF file of the September issue of Galley Gab here:

[http://www.galleygab.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822103926/http:/www.galleygab.net/ "http://www.galleygab.net")

In this issue:

Letterpress: A new era / An interview with Gerald Lange  
Thoughts on making paper  
Creating & printing a poster  
AND more…
author: mikeoconnor
